General.Name: Sports Gear Co. Ltd
General.Description: Sports Gear Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells sports shoes and supplies. The company operates through Footwear Manufacturing Business and Other Business segments. It offers football shoes, baseball shoes, casual sports shoes, football, and American football. The company is also engaged in international investment activities; real estate development, rental, and sales; and manufacturing, processing, and trading of sporting goods, as well as operates research center for sporting goods. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Grand Cayman, Caymans Island.
General.Address: No. 266, Shifen North 5th Road, Taichung City, Taiwan, 407
